name: psycho
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who is crazy and frightening: The man's a psycho.
(of a person) crazy and frightening: He suddenly went psycho and started shooting in all directions. He plays a psycho killer who pushes a woman down a flight of stairs to her death.
More examplesFewer examplesI was in Ireland with my psycho family.We've all seen his psycho act too often before.She is on the lookout for signs of psycho behaviour.
of the mind or mental processes: psychopharmacology (= the study of drugs which affect the mind)
